body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park             History & Culture   Anytime is a great time to learn about Frederick Douglass's incredible life, his home, and his vision.             Management   Find policy documents and other important information about park management.        Kids & Youth   Become a Junior Ranger, collect Civil War to Civil Rights trading cards, or participate in the annual oratorical contest.        Education   Find lesson plans, distance learning programs, suggested reading lists, opportunities for professional development, and more.
title: Frederick Douglass National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
